# haproxy Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "haproxy" {
  username = "admin"
  password = "adminpwd"
  host     = "localhost:5555"
  insecure = true
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String)
- `insecure` (Boolean)
- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
